original_text: Moses alone shall come near to the Lord, but the others shall not come near, and the people shall not come up with him.”
korean_text: 너 모세만 여호와께 가까이 나아오고 그들은 가까이 나아오지 말며 백성은 너와 함께 올라오지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Moses alone shall come near to the Lord
but the others shall not come near
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다른 사람들은 가까이 오지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the people shall not come up with him
